quick_answers.quick_setup: Place the Dragon Guild board in the center, shuffle dragon and cave cards, distribute starting resources, and begin with the start player marker.
in_depth_setup: Place the Dragon Guild board in the center.
Select 1 of the 4 Dragon Guild tiles and place it on the Dragon Guild board.
Shuffle all dragon cards and place 3 face-up on the card display board.
Shuffle all cave cards and place 3 face-up on the card display board.
Place the round marker on the Round 1 space on the round tracker board.
Shuffle the objective tiles and place 4 at random on the round tracker board.
Place coins, eggs, and all tokens in a public supply within reach of all players.
Each player places their player mat in front of them.
Each player gains 3 resources of their choice.
Each player places 1 egg on one of the 2 nest icons on their player mat.
Each player places their starting coins to the left of their mat.
Each player places their adventurer in Base Camp on their player mat.
Each player places their guild token on the Dragon Guild space labeled 'START.'
Each player places their remaining player markers, dragons, and cave cards nearby.
Randomly give a player the start player marker, then begin the game.
quick_answers.overall_overview: In Wyrmspan, players build a sanctuary for dragons by excavating spaces and enticing dragons to roost. The game is played over 4 rounds, with each round consisting of players taking turns to excavate, entice, or explore. The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins.

overview.description: Build a sanctuary for dragons by excavating spaces and enticing dragons to roost. The game is played over 4 rounds, with players taking turns to excavate, entice, or explore.

phases.name: Excavate
phases.description: Play a cave card into an empty space in a cave to provide benefits and a space to hold a dragon.
steps: Select an empty space in one of your caves.
Pay the cost to excavate (coins and eggs).
Place a cave card from your hand onto the empty space.
Activate 'when played' benefits of the cave card.
Activate 'when covered' benefits on the player mat space covered by the cave card.

phases.name: Entice
phases.description: Play a dragon card into an excavated space to gain immediate benefits.
steps: Select a dragon from your hand.
Pay the base cost and additional costs of the dragon.
Place the dragon into an excavated space matching its habitat.
Activate 'when played' benefits of the dragon.

phases.name: Explore
phases.description: Move your adventurer through a cave to activate abilities and gain benefits.
steps: Pay the cost to enter the cave (coins and eggs).
Move the adventurer from left to right through the cave.
Activate all 'if activated' abilities the adventurer passes.

details: Abilities that allow all players to do something are activated in clockwise order.
Items acquired go to the player's hand or supply by default.
Capacity limits: 9 resource tokens, 9 cards, and 9 coins at the end of each turn.
Cards and cave cards are refilled at the end of each player's turn.

dragon_guild.description: Players earn Dragon Guild advancements by walking their adventurers through caves or playing certain dragons or cave cards.
steps: Move guild token 1 space clockwise around the Dragon Guild track.
Gain the benefit printed on the space landed on.
Place a player marker on the Dragon Guild tile when landing on a brown space.
Players discard any coins and eggs paid as costs on their player mat.
Activate 'once per round' dragon abilities.
Score the roundâ€™s objective and place player markers on the round tracker.
Move the round marker 1 space to the right.
Refresh the cards in the display.
Each player gains 6 coins and 1 egg.
The start player marker advances 1 player clockwise.

categories: Printed VP values on visible dragons on the player mat
End game abilities on visible dragons on the player mat
Eggs: Gain 1 VP per egg unless specified otherwise
Cached resources: Gain 1 VP per cached resource unless specified otherwise
Tucked cards: Gain 1 VP per tucked dragon unless specified otherwise
Excess items and coins: Gain 1 VP per coin and 1 VP for every 4 other items

steps: Excavate by playing a cave card into the leftmost empty space in one of your caves.
Entice a dragon by playing a dragon card into the leftmost excavated space in one cave.
Explore your caves to activate abilities and gain benefits.
